name: Gemini Live 2.5 Flash Preview
description: Enables low-latency, real-time voice and audio interactions via Live API. Processes continuous streams of audio with immediate, natural-sounding spoken responses. Supports proactive audio and affective dialog.
notes: PREVIEW - Deprecated model, replaced by gemini-2.5-flash-native-audio-preview-09-2025. Live API with 25 tokens per second of audio (input/output). Audio input priced at $3.00/1M tokens, audio output at $12.00/1M tokens. Voice Activity Detection and multilingual support included.
